segments.text: Hello . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I hope so . I would like to register for Comp Lit 287 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but that class is already full.And also , students are supposed to register through the touch-tone registration system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I already tried to register for it by phone , but the computer won't let me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's because it's full .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I'm a new student here . I thought maybe there was some way I could get into the class . I thought I should come and talk to you in the department office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I could put you on a waiting list.But that doesn't guarantee you will get into the class . What is your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Karen Huang . That's spelled H - U - A - N - G .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . And what is your major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a comparative literature major .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute . You're a Comp Lit major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why didn't you tell me ? I didn't know you were one of our students .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's why I'm trying to get into Comp Lit 287 . I know it's a required class.And Professor Cohen told me I need to take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The university computer system saves extra places , in class 287 for comp lit students . I can give you a special code.When you register by phone , you can use the code to get into the class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even if the class is full ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I didn't know that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Here is the code number , with information on how to use it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . So you think I will be able to get in with this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Just call the touch-tone registration system again.Then , follow the directions on the sheet . You will get in no problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next time you come in here , I will recognize you .
segments.speaker: S1
